programme.title: New Taiwan Go
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside.

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Mr Lo has three sons, Leung, Fay and Kung; and a daughter-in-law, Eliza. While they seem like a normal family, their relationships need mending. Leung and Fay play a prank on their brother Kung on his birthday by falsely claiming that he has won the lottery. This sets off a chain reaction of funny mishaps that finally brings the family together.

programme.title: We Girls
programme.desc: To afford a 200,000-yuan cochlear implant for her daughter, Gao takes a desperate risk that lands her in prison. During her time there, and after her release, she befriends three women. Despite their different personalities, they form a close bond to defy fate and support each other through hardship.

programme.title: Stuntman
programme.desc: Washed-up stunt director Li Sen is offered the role of action choreographer on his director friend's final film. Bringing along an ambitious young stuntman, the two generations risk everything to stage a comeback. As Li Sen battles his fierce temper and past mistakes, he also strives to mend his relationship with his estranged daughter.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other's parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents' first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: Unbeatable
programme.desc: Former world champion boxer Fai meets fiery young fighter Qi in Macau. As he mentors Qi for an upcoming MMA tournament, Fai rekindles his passion for fighting, life, and the people he cares about.

programme.title: Let's Get Rich
programme.desc: The Jia family, a group of talented Taiwanese con artists, is recruited by a fraudster to expose a corrupt tech tycoon's Ponzi scheme and to steal millions from him through a complex deception plan.

programme.title: Queen of Mahjong
programme.desc: When Village Chief Long abruptly demands his three daughters bring home their boyfriends, chaos and comedy ensue. Set against the lively backdrop of mahjong tiles, this heartwarming Chinese New Year comedy weaves hilarious romantic mishaps with long-buried family secrets.

programme.title: Ha Ha Ha Happy New Year!!
programme.desc: Business tycoon Duan is kidnapped and seriously injured by the "Shadow Empire", accidentally losing his memory. Duan is looked after by Su, a temple owner, and as he slowly recovers, Duan discovers that he has been replaced by a doppelgnger, prompting him to uncover a shocking hidden secret.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: A real estate tycoon plans to turn a marine protected area into a new property development, thereby destroying the secret habitat of the mermaids. A beautiful mermaid, Shan, is tasked to seduce the tycoon and stop the destruction. However, when Shan's mission fails, a final, fatal war between humans and mermaids becomes inevitable.

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenix's (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: Remember What I Forgot
programme.desc: Struggling with Alzheimer's disease, Hong Kong film buff Kim relies on his brother to manage their appliance repair shop. Kim's quirky behaviour prompts producer Ginger to suspect that he may be a film critic trying to profit from harsh reviews. Posing as a friend, Ginger uncovers Kim's secrets and sorrows as she gets closer to him and his family.

programme.title: Life Hotel
programme.desc: Once a gangster, Li struggles to find work to pay for his father's heart surgery. To earn money, he goes undercover to help shut down Life Hotel for a redevelopment project, but gradually forms bonds with its residents. As Li discovers that the hotel serves as a home for the sick, he grapples with his sense of responsibility and empathy.

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: After Goddess Nuwa sacrifices herself to save the mortal world, Monkey King comes into being from one of her crystals. Powerful and uncontrollable, Monkey King challenges the Jade Emperor and causes an uproar in heaven, unwittingly creating an opportunity for the wicked Buffalo Demon King to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: Twin Blades Of Doom
programme.desc: A retired martial artist is forced to return with a vengeance after his family and friends are murdered by the evil Ghost Gang. He decides to challenge the gang's leader to a deadly duel so as to take revenge. Can he defeat the ruthless leader in the end?

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband's death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Swordsman at Large
programme.desc: Hsiao Shi Yi Lang is the Swordsman at large who everyone wants to kill. A magnificient sword is even created for this purpose though the blade is soon coveted more than the swordsman's death by it! Bandits, beauties and blade masters battle for survival in this exciting story of deceit, betrayal, and death.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people's livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Tigress Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Sam is being hunted as he discovers that the mayor and the chief of medical bureau are colluding with a drug dealer. He is saved by a fishermen family and works in their friend's grocery but the grocery owner is killed when the enemies track Sam down. Sam escapes to Shaolin to learn the cudgel style of kung fu in order to avenge his friends.

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Dong and Chu plan to get married but their families who are lifelong rivals, disapproved. They decide to fake suicide and eventually get both of their parents to settle their differences and approve the marriage. Concurrently, a record company announces that they will release Dong's songs, leading to double bliss for the couple.

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Feng, a homeless man, is wrongly accused of robbery and subsequently arrested and imprisoned. The actual bandit bribes fellow inmate Yang, a pickpocket, to kill Feng. Aware of Feng's innocence, Yang resolves to help him escape from prison. However, their escape attempt goes awry, and both find themselves facing the grim reality of death row.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaire's Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: The Fighting Fool
programme.desc: Famous Kung Fu Pole master Red Eagle, is kidnapped by a villain one day. His disciple Meng, vows to rescue him. On his way, Meng encounters a greedy but great martial artist who agrees to join him in the rescue. Even though the two have extremely different personalities, they manage to team up and fight the villain in a final showdown.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.desc: Adding a twist to ghost comedies, three ghosts in Bhootlok are assigned with the job to scare those on earth who stray onto the path of wrong behavior.

programme.title: SIGHT UNSEEN
programme.desc: When Lucas (Alec Santos) comes to Tess' (Dolly Lewis) apartment in the middle of the night claiming he just needs a place to crash, Tess is quick to realize something is up. Tess unearths a bombshell when she visits a crime scene with Jake (Daniel Gillies) and finds disturbing clues that suggest Lucas may be implicated in the murder of a famous painter. Torn between her loyalty to the Homicide Division and the need to protect the only family she has left, Tess says nothing to Jake but instead uses Sunny (Agam Darshi) to watch over Lucas via a nanny cam while she gets to the bottom of the case. Meanwhile, Sunny invites Kye (Ennis Esmer) into her home to help with her DIY, but he stumbles onto a piece of her hidden past breaking her fragile trust.

programme.title: FBI: INTERNATIONAL
programme.desc: The Fly Team heads to Poland to track down the mastermind behind a kidnapping.

programme.title: KUNG FU HUSTLE
programme.desc: From Asia's top comedy star Stephen Chow comes Kung Fu Hustle, the highly anticipated follow-up to his smash 2001 hit Shaolin Soccer. Set amid the chaos of pre-revolutionary China, scruffy Sing (Chow) is looking to elevate his status in hopes of joining the sophisticated and ruthless Axe Gang. When Sing attempts to extort money from a local at the crowded apartment complex known as Pig Sty Alley, his comical attempts at intimidation inadvertently attract the Axe Gang into the conflict. The dilemma finds the inhabitants of the Pig Sty fighting for their lives and unearthing some legendary martial arts masters. Sing now must face his own mortality in order to discover the true nature of the kung fu master.

programme.desc: RZA co-writes, directs, and stars in this genre-blending, hip-hop-infused kung fu film set in Hong Kong, featuring Russell Crowe, Lucy Liu, and produced by Quentin Tarantino.

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.title: Hard Target
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this John Woo action thriller where a man battles a deadly group that hunts humans for sport. Also features Lance Henriksen and Wilford Brimley.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: In Miami Vice, undercover detectives played by Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell navigate danger, crime, and seduction in a gritty, stylish update of the iconic TV series. Also stars Gong Li.

programme.title: Godzilla Minus One
programme.desc: In postwar Japan, Godzilla brings new devastation to an already scorched landscape. With no military intervention or government help in sight, the survivors must join together in the face of despair and fight back against an unrelenting horror.

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves stars in 47 Ronin, an epic fantasy where an outcast joins samurai on a quest for vengeance and honor against a ruthless overlord in ancient Japan.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills season 15 kicks off on Monday,Housewives Erika Jayne, Dorit Kemsley, Kyle Richards, Bozoma Saint John, and Sutton Stracke return for a season marked by fresh starts, major fallouts and unforgettable adventures. New housewife and fashion mogul Rachel Zoe makes a dazzling return to Bravo after more than a decade. Single and stepping back into the spotlight on her own terms, she's ready to unveil RZ 2.0 to the world. Also joining the group is housewife Amanda Frances, a self-made businesswoman who lives in her friend Kyle Richards' former family home. She's determined to build her future in the land of fame and fortune.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: Dorit has recently filed for divorce and opens up to the ladies about her ex, their children and if she's ready for a Hot Girl Summer. Kyle is planning Alexia's wedding and navigating life with Mauricio. Sutton must reassess her friendships in the group after being cut off by her former bestie. A familiar face makes a fashionable entrance at Kyle's Summer Solstice Party as Kathy arrives with Rachel Zoe.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
programme.desc: After an evasive conversation at the Summer Solstice party, Boz and Rachel are left wondering about the sincerity of certain friendships. Erika turns to Sutton for support amid a looming lawsuit. Kyle opens up about the ending of her first relationship since separating from her husband. Dorit fights back tears as her divorce takes a toll on her family. New housewife Amanda meets the group at Jennifer Tilly's racy Sip & Draw party.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: 31st Critics Choice Awards 2026
programme.desc: The 31st annual Critics Choice Awards continues to honour the finest in cinematic and television achievement.

programme.title: The Last Dragonslayer
programme.desc: In a world where magic is waning and technology prevails, 15-year-old Jennifer Strange runs a magician employment agency and discovers the last dragon is being hunted.

programme.title: The Bodyguard From Beijing
programme.desc: Corrupt tycoon kills witness to a crime. Only the girlfriend of a businessman with Chinese govt. ties saw it. Beijing bodyguard helps Hong Kong police protect her. But he and the witness develop feelings, complicating matters.

programme.title: Fist Of Legend
programme.desc: In 1937, a Chinese martial artist returns to Shanghai to find his teacher dead and his school harassed by the Japanese.

programme.title: Twin Dragons
programme.desc: Identical twins - a musician living in New York, and a mechanic living in Hong Kong - are separated in childhood but are unexpectedly reunited years later when the musician travels to Hong Kong for a concert.

programme.title: The Legend 2
programme.desc: Fong Sai Yuk joins the Red Flower revolution to topple the Manchus and restore the Ming. Amidst high-flying martial arts and rigid society demands, the legendary hero must also manage the chaos of his personal life, saddled with two presumptive wives!

programme.title: Tai Chi Master
programme.desc: Two friends, ex Shaolin monks, part ways as they brush with the ongoing rebellion against the government. The ambitious one rises up to be a powerful military commander, while his betrayed friend resorts to learn the calm ways of Tai Chi.

programme.title: Fist From Shaolin
programme.desc: A Shaolin warrior battles slave traders to stop his countrymen from being sold into bondage in the gold mines in America.

programme.title: Extinction - The Facts
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough and a cast of world leading scientists bring us the facts behind the current extinction crisis. Revealing what extinction is, what is happening now, why it is happening and what could happen in the future.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories
programme.desc: This final episode is about a challenge: it is about visionary tea-makers throwing a gauntlet down, challenging humanity to change their tastes and habits - to step out into an exciting future.

programme.title: Wild Horses, the Rockies and Me
programme.desc: Gordon Buchanan tracks and befriends a vast herd of wild horses in Canada.

programme.title: Asia
programme.desc: Asia has the longest coastline of any continent and the earth's richest coral reefs. This episode explores Asia's waters, as spectacular as they are diverse, and never-seen-before animal behaviour.

programme.title: Asia
programme.desc: Asia is the most mountainous continent on earth. From the tropical south to its barren centre, its highest places are home to some of our planet's most remarkable wildlife.

programme.title: Asia
programme.desc: In the remote reaches of Asia's frozen north, creatures must overcome unique challenges, finding exceptional ways to thrive in a hostile world that pushes life to its very limits.

programme.title: Asia
programme.desc: Asia's jungles are beautiful and exceptionally diverse, but whilst they provide shelter, food and opportunity, they are also full of dangers and hidden threats.

programme.title: Asia
programme.desc: In the planet's most densely populated continent, animals live at extremely close quarters with people, from tigers making a home in town to elephants stopping traffic for food.

programme.title: Asia
programme.desc: In the heart of Asia lie vast arid lands. These deserts and dry grasslands are so hostile, they push life to the limit. The animals that live here are some of the earth's toughest.

programme.title: Asia
programme.desc: Many passionate people are dedicated to saving the wild animals of Asia. These individuals and their ingenious solutions give us hope and optimism for the future of the continent.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: Robson's journey continues in Patagonia, where he goes on the hunt for the massive Chinook Salmon.

programme.title: China's Wild Guangdong
programme.desc: In northern Guangdong, majestic mountain ranges are home to a dazzling array of wildlife; Silver Pheasants, Chinese Pangolins, Black Kites, Chinese Giant Salamanders, and an entirely new species of cave gecko.

programme.title: The Great Wall with Ash Dykes
programme.desc: Ash Dykes highlights conservation in Mutianyu, visits Shixia's wall protectors, explores tech at Jiankou, and bravely tackles the perilous Eagles Neck climb.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life
programme.desc: Headphones: these marvels of miniaturisation are worn by 30 million people in the UK. Hannah Fry visits Bose to find out how the teeny earbud tech works and meets the human testers with 'golden ears'.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters
programme.desc: Journey through mystical lakes, where life adapts, survives, and transforms. Witness the power of ancient beasts like the snapping turtle, watch a dragonfly metamorphosis, and walk tall with flamingoes as they brave burning, corrosive waters.

programme.title: Gladiators
programme.desc: Witness clashes over precious resources when the dry season brings a band of gladiators to an African savannah watering hole. See a lion-elephant territory brawl, an ant raid on a termite mound, and a honey badger's risky dance with a deadly snake.

programme.title: Big Cat Country
programme.desc: When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Big Cat Country
programme.desc: The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomad's brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Uptown Otters
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Extreme Africa
programme.desc: Etosha was once a great lake that dried up and now only fills with water seasonally during the summer rains. Once the Etosha pan is full of water, a myriad of water birds congregate in the shallow lake to breed, most notably Greater and lesser flamingos.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters
programme.desc: Trace dazzling waterways all over the world, from volcanic rivers in Russia's far east to geothermal streams in Florida. Watch as beavers transform entire landscapes with their well-engineered dams, then enjoy a winter spa day with manatees.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters

programme.title: Survival of the Beast

programme.title: Team Zenko Go

programme.desc: When the trees start losing their leaves, Phoebe begins knitting the trees in the park sweaters, but when the neighborhood kids see the sweaters they think they're a mysterious "Yarn Fairy," and they want to see her in action, making it much harder for the Dews to put more sweaters on the latest trees that have lost their leaves. / When Marcus and Harper team-up for a school project, they decide to bake something ("It's like inventing, but with food!"), only to come across multiple baking misshaps (and happy accidents) along the way that the Dew Drops must secretly assist them with.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When "something" starts snatching things and causing havoc in Marcus' house, Phoebe and the Dew Drops investigate only to find that it's a stray kitten that they need to catch and find a home for before Marcus returns home. With Boss Baby's cover at stake, it's up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib

programme.title: UFC 325: Volkanovski vs. Lopes 2 - Prelims
programme.desc: On Sunday, February 1, UFC returns to Sydney Olympic Park, New South Wales, Australia for UFC 325 which will be headlined by a featherweight championship rematch between titleholder Alexander The Great Volkanovski and challenger Diego Lopes. The duo faced off for the vacant featherweight title last April at UFC 314 in Miami, with Volkanovski earning a unanimous decision victory to reclaim in the throne in the 145-pound weight class.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded - UFC 316: Devalishvili vs O'Malley 2
programme.desc: A championship doubleheader headlines the Octagons return to the Prudential Center in Newark, New Jersey for UFC 316 on June 7. In the main event, its a highly anticipated rematch when relentless force Merab Dvalishvili defends his bantamweight crown against the man he took it from, Suga Sean OMalley. Plus, the womens bantamweight title is on the line in the co-main event as Julianna Pea faces off with two-time Olympic gold medal winning judoka Kayla Harrison. All this and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 - 1
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola - 16
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
